altTitles.ja: スネキャン

description.en:
Mostly started as a seiyuu connection joke, since Snake's Japanese voice actor Ootsuka Akio is also the narrator for Yurucamp.  
Plot - Snake infiltrates camps and begins his mission: to make comments during the events.
description.pt-br: Snake se infiltra em acampamentos e começa sua missão: fazer comentários no decorrer dos eventos.

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito ~Danzai sareta Tenseisha no Tame Usotsuki Heroine ni Fukushuu Itashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人
悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～

altTitles.ja: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Cư Ngụ Bên Trong Ác Nữ

altTitles.fr: La fille au sein de l'antagoniste
Celle à l'intérieur de la vilaine

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

description.en: Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 昴 スバル
昴

altTitles.th: ซูบารุ เต้นสุดใจ ไกลสุดฝัน

description.en: A small five-year-old girl named Subaru no longer has time for friends and play. Why is this? Her twin brother Kazuma is dying… and gradually forgetting everything. Even Subaru. And so the girl visits him every day, talking with him and dancing for him, trying to make him remember her. And he always does by the end of the day. Encouraged by a friend to join ballet classes, the girl does so and falls in love with the dance.

A college student get's hit by a bus and wakes up in the world of her favourite DatingSim Game " Miracle Lovers " as a side character with no role. Not only is she a mere supporting role, her character is also destined to die, when she turns 18. Can she change her destiny and live peacefully?  
 
If you want to translate my work please ask for permission first.

title.en: Nokori Ichinichi de Hametsu Flag Zenbu Heshiorimasu: Zamaa RTA Kiroku 24Hr

altTitles.en: With One Day Left I'll Break All the Destruction Flags: "Serves You Right!" RTA 24 Hour Record

altTitles.ja: 残り一日で破滅フラグ全部へし折ります: ざまぁRTA記録24Hr

altTitles.en: Only One Day Remaining to Break All My Destruction Flags: 24 Hour Just Deserts Speedrun

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World
A Sage Is Summoned to Another World ~The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest~

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo
El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ja-ro: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku - Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く
召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shōkan sa Reta Kenja wa Isekai o Iku ~ Saikyōna no wa Fuyō Zaiko no Item deshita ~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

description.en:
After confessing my love at the end of our graduation ceremony, we accidentally met again in college.

Chan-ran, a piano prodigy, and Hye-joon, an ex-lover of Chan-ran. Hye-joon, who has not yet forgotten his brother who has committed suicide, looked like him.

Agitated by his voice, Hye-joon, who was drunk, slowly closed his eyes and fell into the temptation to sleep...

altTitles.ja: アークナイツ OPERATORS!

description.en:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
description.pt-br: A história segue os membros do grupo Rhodes Island, um grupo criado com o propósito de proteger e ajudar pessoas infectadas com Oripatia. Acompanhe o dia a dia deles enquanto fazem seu trabalho.

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.ja: オシバナ！

description.en: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

altTitles.ja: 令和のダラさん

description.en:
Seeing it brings misfortune; defiling it brings a curse? Introducing a new era of strangeness, abandoning seriousness!

On a stormy day, a landslide destroys a fence, and siblings who ventured into a long-prohibited area encounter a terrifyingly bizarre creature...
"I'm a curse god, you know!? Don't you think anything of this grotesque form?!?"
The unflappable siblings, rather than being scared, casually call the creature "Dara-San" and grow fond of it!?

Seemingly scary but not at all! A new era of occult comedy that leaves seriousness behind.
description.es:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.
description.es-la:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.

altTitles.ja: ふたりサボタージュ
オレと恋愛してみませんか

description.en:
Recently divorced gay company man, Narumi, visits a cafe he used to be a regular at prior to his marriage. There, cafe employee Kida confesses that he has feelings for Narumi, having been comforted by Narumi’s words four years ago. Due to past trauma, Narumi has become timid in love, but when Kida proposes, “Won’t you try falling in love with me?” their love trial begins!
An obedient younger doggy-type x innocent alpha’s bittersweet, too cute, pure love begins!

altTitles.ja: クズ系ヒーロー　クズ男マン

description.en:
You know you've made errors in your life when you're at a wedding and simultaneously realize that
1. You're gay
2. You're in love with the groom and
3. You're a tender uke built like the manliest of macho men.

And thus, Haneru has no other option but to go into a depression for 3 whole years - until a certain divorcee moves in to live with Haneru's family...

altTitles.ja: 冬庭のハワール

description.en:
Princess Canola, was forced to marry in an arranged marriage far away from the kingdom due to the fight for the throne. She fell in love with the first person she saw at first sight! However, the people of Tripol Kingdom treat her as a stranger and ignore her, and inform her that she cannot marry until she passes her three tests. Even her affection alone is enough to make her cold to her... She is here she can't back down. She has already named her grandson and granddaughter. I'll get through that test quickly!

---
Princess Canola arrives in wintery Tripol expecting a warm welcome from her future husband, Edel, and his kingdom. It's love at first sight the moment she lays eyes on him. But her picture-perfect fantasy comes crashing down when the people of Tripol reject an outlander for their prince. Now, Canola has to jump through hoops just to remain in Edel's orbit. Most would crumble under the pressure, but Canola isn't about to miss her chance to land herself a dreamy husband. She just has to find a way to melt prince charming's heart, and all the icy hearts in Tripol.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4903921)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9109732), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=802835)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/hawar-in-the-winter-garden)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dongritingyuandehabuer/list?title_no=2337)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/hawar-of-the-winter-garden/list?title_no=5147)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002772)
description.zh:
一见钟情冷酷帅气未婚夫！
可和他结婚还要通过考验？
因王位争夺，王女芸苔被送到很远的地方进行政治联姻。但她却对初见的未婚夫一见钟情!可那儿的人却对她冷眼相待还告诉她，要通过三个考验才能结婚。呵！区区几个考验而已，她可绝不会退缩！

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4903921)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9109732), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=802835)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/hawar-in-the-winter-garden)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dongritingyuandehabuer/list?title_no=2337)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/hawar-of-the-winter-garden/list?title_no=5147)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002772)
description.pt-br:
A quarta princesa de Charlemann, Canola F. Incana Charlemann, que foi expulsa de Charlemann por causa da luta de seu irmão pelo trono, foi informada que deveria se casar com o filho único do monarca de Tripol, cujo ela não conhece o rosto nem o nome.
A caminho de Tripol, através das irregulares montanhas nevadas, para um casamento, ela encontrou Ethel, o herdeiro de Tripol, seu prometido, seu futuro marido...
"Princesa, cumprimente-o depressa..."
Canola não respondeu o lembrete, apenas o encarou. Canola, que estava piscando os olhos e fazendo uma expressão estúpida, cobriu a boca com a mão e se virou.
"Acho que estou apaixonada."
Um homem tão puro e lindo! Ela não pode evitar se apaixonar por ele!
"Um homem que não pode nem proteger sua companheira não pode se tornar um guerreiro Tripol. Nós... Nós ainda temos um longo caminho até nos tornarmos um casal oficialmente, mas é meu trabalho protegê-la."
Quando Ethel terminou de falar, ele avançou com a fera na qual estava montado, cavalgando para longe. Canola, que estava encarando suas costas, lentamente retornou para a carruagem. Seu rosto estava levemente corado.
"Viu? Você viu? Veja. Você não está apaixonada por ele?"
Acho que estão interpretando o significado de minhas palavras de forma distorcida.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4903921)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9109732), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=802835)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/hawar-in-the-winter-garden)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dongritingyuandehabuer/list?title_no=2337)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/hawar-of-the-winter-garden/list?title_no=5147)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002772)
description.zh-hk:
爭奪王位失利，只能被迫接受政策聯姻遠嫁他方的卡諾拉。卻對自己的未婚夫一見鐘情！ 但即將嫁去的特里波人卻將她視為外國人，不僅蔑視她，還提出必須通過三項考驗才能結婚。甚至連未婚夫對她的態度也極盡冷漠… 但本公主怎麼可能就此打退堂鼓呢？我可是連孫子、孫女名字都取好了呢！ 不過是個考驗而已，就快點過關斬將搞定它吧！

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4903921)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9109732), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=802835)

title.en: Tenseishita Daiseijo wa, Seijo Dearu Koto wo Hitakakusu: A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.ja: 転生した大聖女は、聖女であることをひた隠す A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.en: A Tale of the Secret Saint

altTitles.fr: La grande Sainte réincarnée cache que c'en est une.

description.en:
Fia, who is aiming to be a knight in a family of knights, remembers her previous life as a "Grand Saint" when she was on the verge of dying. The saint is currently a highly important and respected profession because it's on the verge of extinction! The holy power she can use happens to be the "lost magic" of myths.  
  
In her previous life, she was threatened by the right arm of the Demon King, saying, "I'll kill you again if you're reborn as a saint."  
  
"If I use such power, I wonder if I would be caught and killed once again…"  
  
Watch as she tries to live a simple life as a knight, hiding the fact that she's a Grand Saint!  


---

- **[Official English License Announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/09/18/seven-seas-reveals-a-great-secret-with-license-of-a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel-and-manga-series/)**  
- **[Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel/)**
description.ja: 「剣の才能がない」と言われていた騎士家の少女・フィーア。彼女は死にかかった際、規格外のチート能力を持つ「大聖女」だった前世を思い出し、最強の魔物・黒竜を従魔にする。しかし前世で「聖女として生まれ変わったら殺す」と魔王の右腕に脅されたことを思い出した彼女は、大聖女の力を隠しながら、騎士を目指すが数々の騒動を巻き起こすことに！？

altTitles.th: ALTAIR ดาวจรัสฟ้า อินทรีถลาลม

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thiên Ưng trên bầu trời Tướng quốc

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10291/episode/324757) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/altair-a-record-of-battles/)

**Notes:**
- Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.

Soo-jeong is always getting on the self-absorbed Eunchan's nerves since he first appeared before him out of the blue.

Soo-jeong feels the same way towards the socially inept Eun-chan, who is often harsh towards him.

Their ironic relationship develops as they try to survive together, even though they don't trust one another.

What should you trust? Your past experiences and memories, or intuition?

altTitles.ja: まって、好き。

description.en:
“Because when we’re together, you make me feel like the most loved person in the world.”
Haruto, a hairdresser, is dating Aoi Kuga, an actor who is rapidly gaining popularity.
Aoi, being the doting lover he is, comes to see Haruto even if he only has 5 minutes of free time. Haruto likewise spoils him everyday with mutual love.
When Aoi receives an offer to star in a movie, Haruto is also assigned to the same site as a hair and makeup artist...
Can they keep their love from being found out!?
Wait, I love you. A righteous love that will endure!
A newly drawn comic that includes 11 erotic pages depicting the cute jealousy of a young boyfriend!!
It also includes a new digital exclusive page.

altTitles.ja: 陰キャなつばめは変わりたい
徐々に陰度が下がっていく陰キャちゃん

altTitles.en: Yinka-chan, Whose Yin Level is Gradually Decreasing

description.en:
The story is about a university student, Tsubame Takashina, who has no presence, meets a boy, Taisei Kyogoku, and tries to overcome her negative attitude little by little.

[Chapter 5 Pixiv Raw](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/109457638) (Not included in the Pixiv Series Index)

[Retail - Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2005392)

title.en: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: Oreyome
Kono Naka ni 1-ri, Ore no Yome ga Iru
この中に1人、俺の嫁がいる

altTitles.en: One of them is my wife

description.en:
For the sake of finding clues about his younger twin brother who suddenly went missing, the protagonist changed his identity and infiltrated the academy his brother was attending.

However, what clearly came to light there was a surprising truth! His brother had multiple fiancées...?

(Source: Ganma)
description.id: Souya seorang laki-laki yang menggantikan posisi adiknya yang tiba-tiba menghilang, Terlebih lagi dia menemukan fakta yang mengejutkan bahwa adiknya memiliki banyak tunangan?
description.ja: 突如失踪した双子の弟の手がかりを得る為、入れ替わって学園に潜入することになった主人公。 しかし、そこで明らかになるのは驚愕の事実！ 弟には複数人の婚約者が居て……？

altTitles.en: To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)

altTitles.ja: 公爵夫人の秘密のクローゼット

altTitles.zh: 公爵夫人的秘密服装店

description.en:
*How much money must I spend for you to divorce me?!*

Rubika dies in a war without being able to confess her love for Arman but is instead sent back in time. A new life, she will not live in vain. But what are these new obstacles?

---
*'If I had known sooner that life would never wait, I wouldn't have hesitated so much...'*

After living a hard life in the ravaged war ruins, Rubica dies without even confessing to her beloved Armand.

But what is this?

At the age of 22, with Armand’s ring, Rubica returned to the pre-war period. After returning, Rubica tries to find Armand who may be alive but is caught by the proposal of her kingdom's supreme ruler, the Duke of Claymore.

Rubica, who eventually became the duchess because of her greedy uncle and aunt, now plans to squander her husband's fortune, be disgraced as a 'luxurious duchess,’ and get him to divorce her.

However, contrary to what she intended, her fame rises due to her overflowing talent, and her husband, who she thought was indifferent to her, slowly begins to take an interest in her... Where is the end of her luxury, which began to flow in a direction she never expected?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)
description.pl:
Ile pieniędzy muszę wydać, żebyś się ze mną rozwiódł!? Rubika umiera na wojnie, nie mogąc wyznać swojej miłości do Armana. Nie wiedzieć jak ani czemu cofnęła się w czasie. Otrzymała nowe życie, nie będzie żyła na próżno, ale jakie nowe przeszkody będą stały na jej drodze?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)
description.zh:
前世到老都没有向爱人表白，卢菲卡重生后，只想找到爱人阿尔芒再续前缘，但是被帝国最高公爵的强制婚约所阻碍。努力败家想要离婚，可越奢侈越爱美，钱却赚得越多！禁欲的婚后生活也越来越暧昧…原来，前世爱人早已陪伴在身边？

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

description.en:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?

A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

description.en:
A virgin high school boy falling in love with a slutty Gal who let everyone have sex with her and one day accidentally saw her having sex with a schoolmate.


---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437), [Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.

Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 竜虎愛搏つ

description.en:
One night, brash blonde high school student Toraji went to a party with his childhood best friend, Ryunosuke. At the party, they both got lucky and ended up having a threesome with a cute girl. However, in the heat of the moment, Ryunosuke leaned over the girl's shoulder and kissed Toraji deeply! What's a yankee boy to do when he realizes his best friend is in love with him!?

This volume also contains "ONE ON ONE", a story about a delinquent's first love with the delinquent senpai he needs to fight!
description.uk: Одного вечора самовпевнений білявий старшокласник Торадзі пішов на вечірку з другом дитинства Рюноске. На вечірці обом пощастило зайнятись сексом утрьох з милою дівчиною. Та несподівано Рюноске нахилився через плече дівчини і поцілував Торадзі! Що робити хлопцю-янкі, коли його найкращий друг у нього закоханий?! Цей том також містить "Один на один", історію про перше кохання бандита до старшого хлопця, проти якого він мусить боротися.

title.en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?

altTitles.ja: 私をセンターにすると誓いますか？

altTitles.en: Do You Swear to Center Me?

description.en:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.

A story about the "Japanese Dream" begins, as they work together as a team to reach stardom in the entertainment world!

altTitles.ja: 着たい服がある

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

altTitles.ja: 酩酊の女傭兵ベル。

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê hệ cồn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en:
A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
___
**Note**: Chapters “6.7” and “9.10” are Chapters 6 & 7 and 9 & 10 respectively. Chapters 6 and 9 are textless (and therefore have nothing to translate), so they've been put together with the successive chapter to comply with MangaDex rules.

altTitles.ja: ごちうさ
ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

title.ja-ro: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.es-la: No te burles de mi, Nagatoro

altTitles.ja: イジらないで、長瀞さん

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวแสบแอบน่ารัก นางาโทโระ

altTitles.ar: لا تلعبي معي يا آنسة ناغاتورو

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

title.en: Maronie Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.ja-ro: Marronnier Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.en: The Seven Knights of the Marronnier Kingdom

altTitles.ja: マロニエ王国の七人の騎士

description.en:
A tale of seven knights that swear loyalty to a princess.  
  
---
**Notes:**
- Ranked #1 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2018 (Female readers)

altTitles.ja: サイケデリア

description.en: Mizoshiri Shohei has just been assigned to the organized crime division and has already developed a crush on his senpai, experienced detective Hino Toranosuke. But when Hino gets shot, Mizo feels responsible and decides to take drastic measures.

Alock, taking pride in being an aristocrat, falls in love with Klopp at first sight, a nobleman of a family of lower social status whom he met by chance.
Ignoring the difference in social rank, wealth as well as the taboo of both being Alphas, Alock approaches Klopp, only to be disregarded by Klopp who later marries an Omega.
Blinded by jealousy, Alock ultimately commits a terrible sin. Having learned the truth, Klopp takes a ruthless revenge. Alock struggles and tries to resist all while slowly enduring the price to pay for his sin…

"What you did wasn't love."
"If that wasn't love, I don't know what I should call this feeling."

If given the chance to turn back time, would it make a difference to the pair’s relationship?

'Can life become a blessing once again? 
Can I be guided towards the light once again?
Will I be able to see him along the path under the cedar trees once again?'

title.en: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど美人お嬢様に推されてます

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

title.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: SatoruCie (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga
Regarding Reincarnated to Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga

description.en:
**Web Novel Spoilers Warning: The story takes place on Earth after end of the Web Novel.**

---

Rimuru plants a parallel existance inside Satoru Mikami, to live his life with Ciel and finish his missions he was unable to when he first died.

altTitles.ja: ウェディングピーチ

description.en:
One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
